channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft backs its $3B AI push in India with public and private sector deals
item.description: Microsoft announced a sweeping series of artificial intelligence partnerships across India’s core sectors on Wednesday, a day after pledging to invest...

item.title: All the Top CPU and GPU News From CES 2025
item.description: This year, it’s shaping up to be AI, all the time.

item.title: 11 More of the Most Fun Things We've Seen at CES
item.description: As our week in Las Vegas winds to a close, here's a final look at the most clever, smart, and forward-looking tech at CES 2025.

item.title: Meta Follows Elon Musk’s Lead, Moves Staffers to Billionaire-Friendly Texas
item.description: According to Mark Zuckerberg, Meta trust and safety workers will be relocated to Texas to prevent them from “censoring” users. Experts point to other ...

item.title: Casio says hackers stole personal data of 8,500 people during October ransomware attack
item.description: The Japanese electronics giant says it did not negotiate with the hackers responsible for the attack. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For pers...

item.title: NASA Wants to Explore the Icy Moons of Jupiter and Saturn With Autonomous Robots
item.description: Research and development is underway to create robots that can hunt for signs of life in the vast oceans that exist under the thick ice shells of bodi...

item.title: Don’t Count Out Human Writers in the Age of AI
item.description: The appetite for AI-derived drivel isn’t as strong as many publishers would have you believe, and demand for quality content is growing.

item.title: Siren secures strategic funding for its socks that detect diabetic foot ulcers
item.description: After studying burn victims and war veterans, entrepreneur Ran Ma hand-made a sock that contained sensors to detect foot ulcers. Now, her company, Sir...

item.title: SteamOS expands to other gaming handhelds with the Lenovo Legion Go S
item.description: SteamOS is slowly becoming an alternative to Windows for handheld gaming devices. After launching the Steam Deck with SteamOS, its own operating syste...

item.title: UN aviation agency confirms hacker breached recruitment database to access thousands of records
item.description: ICAO says compromised data includes job applicants' names, email addresses and employment history © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal...
